Text: Baghdad Central Station is the main train station in Baghdad.

Text: Baghdad Central Station:  It links the rail network to the south and the north of Iraq.

2:
--------------------
Text: Baghdad Central Station:  The station was built by the British to designs by J M Wilson, a Scot who had been an assistant to Lutyens in New Delhi and who subsequently set up a practice of his own in Baghdad.
Triplets:<Baghdad Central Station

Text: Baghdad Central Station:  Construction started in 1948 and finished in 1953.

4:

Text: Baghdad Central Station:  The station is the biggest one in Iraq.
